items.name: Day 1: Light
items.description: And God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light.

items.name: Day 2: Sky
items.description: God made the vault and separated the water under the vault from the water above it.

items.name: Day 3: Land and Vegetation
items.description: God said, 'Let the land produce vegetation.'

items.name: Day 4: Sun, Moon, and Stars
items.description: God made two great lightsâ€”the greater light to govern the day and the lesser light to govern the night.

items.name: Day 5: Sea Creatures and Birds
items.description: God created the great creatures of the sea and every living thing with which the water teems.

items.name: Day 6: Land Animals and Humanity
items.description: Then God said, 'Let us make mankind in our image.'

items.name: Day 7: Rest
items.description: By the seventh day God had finished the work he had been doing; so on the seventh day he rested.

completion_reward.title: Creation Complete!
completion_reward.description: You've collected all 7 days of creation!
